subject: $700,000 usd accumulated Bonus
body:
$700,000 usd accumulated Bonus from TRUST WALLET FUNDS
YOUR ACCUMULATED TRUST WALLET BITCOIN BONUS OF $700 000 USD DEPOSIT AVAILABLE NOW TO YOUR SAFE UN BOX ONLINE BANK
Your $700,000 usd accumulated Bonus from TRUST WALLET FUNDS is now available to your SAFE UN BOX ONLINE BANK and once you login to your online bank with the below details, you will view your bonus added to your already approved compensation funds
USER DATA
Upliner/Referral
Password:    *********
Personal Account Number/Token:    ***********7
Username:    *******
Your payment plan with TRUST WALLET FUNDS has been changed and updated in background check by the IMF under the authority of the UNITED NATIONS. Trust wallet funds are now linked with SAFE WALLET FUNDS as instructed by the UNITED NATIONS on the 10th december 2023. respond to this email to be directed to the safe bank un box for more details and you can also email them if you still have the bank email. 
LOGIN TO YOUR ACCOUNT AND CONTACT YOUR ACCOUNT OFFICER FOR IMF TRANSFER CODE SO YOU CAN DEPOSIT TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT.
Sincerely Yours
UNITED NATIONS AUDITOR 
GENEVA DUNCAN

subject: Re: $700,000 usd accumulated Bonus
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about the USD bonus from Trust Wallet Funds. Can you please provide more details about how this bonus works and what steps I need to take to access it? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Stanley
